channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Lucene-Search Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Lucene-Search Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-36922|2024-08-03T10:14:29.456Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20lucene-search%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Lucene-Search Plugin 370.v62a5f618cd3a and earlier does not escape the search query parameter displayed on the 'search' result page, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-36910|2024-08-03T10:14:29.472Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20lucene-search%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Lucene-Search Plugin 370.v62a5f618cd3a and earlier does not perform a permission check in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to reindex the database and to obtain information about jobs otherwise inaccessible to them.
